segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s talk about your health a bit. How are you feeling lately? Got any major concerns?
segments.client_message: Umm, yeah, I guess I'm doin' okay, but like I smoke a pack a day, you know? Been smokin' since I was, like, 20 or somethin'. I really should just quit, but it's kinda hard. No major health issues that I know of right now, but I think I might need some long-term care or somethin' since my family has a history of health problems. Oh, and I don't have a will or any power of attorney stuff set up yet either. Just haven’t gotten around to it, honestly.
